TEXT: A Warrior of Fire and Faith, From lands long lost. Determined to vanquish the Spire's Evil.
NL You Breath Deep, and BURN the heart.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Obsidian~ ~Scion,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

~#yVICTORY!~ NL NL The #b~Kingdom's~ Capital now but a burning ruin. Our true foe revealed #pherself this day 5 years ago. Now's the chance. NL NL 5 years of #rWar led to this moment. Over #pher grave lies our destiny. Directing your former ~students~ , now skilled ~warriors~ . facing down the worlds real enemy, she turns to you and says " ~When~ ~people~ ~band~ ~together,~ ~there~ ~is~ ~no~ ~need~ ~for~ #r~gods~ " NL NL " ~Lets~ ~leave~ ~the~ ~world~ ~in~ ~the~ ~hands~ ~of~ ~humanity~ " she tells you as she lays down her crown and we leave the palace together.
A mysterious sorceress from far off lands, a master of all forms of magic and a master of the blade.
NL You Muster your magic and strike with all your might.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. A stalwart guardian of nature, however the Spire Blight has brought ruin to the Grove she swore to protect, with the might of nature, tooth and claw she fights.
NL You muster Elrath and Telratha's Fury and take your vengeance.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~Envoy~ ~of~ ~Telratha~,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
